name: Clay God
storyline:
"It's certainly been a while, hasn't it? I suppose all murderers return to the scene of the crime sooner or later."

You're back here again. A lone classroom. A desk. Her.

Something's not right. You deleted her. You ended this.

Yet, here she is.

She tells you she's recently gotten a hobby -- fortune telling. She offers to give you a tarot reading. The cards are laid out on the table. You're asked to choose. Each one holds a piece of the puzzle: What is this world? What's different about it? Why is she here? Why are you here?

A cursed book. A ritual. A burial in the middle of nowhere.

Sooner or later, all cards will be turned. You will know the truth.

Trouble is, it might already be too late...
summary:
Before you is a set of cards. Every card holds a scene. Every card is a piece of the puzzle. The choice of which ones you flip is yours.

You will experience the scenes of this tale in a random order. By the end, all players will have the same information -- but the journey to them is bound to be different for everyone.
